message: I've noticed. 99% of liberals are quick to be rude. No ethics when conversations with others. Here's some advice Chris even if your right or wrong at work, home or for sure the Internet. Note the sarcasm... I'll believe it when I see it. He's never cared about our cops or soldiers. But a thug dies and he sends his minions to the funeral to represent the White House.

The point is that there were some beta/developing parts of the game that have been shown, based on which the further development phase would be built, depending on the funding. This is such a misleading article. I'm not even into games, but find this highly offensive from an accurate truth point of view. I do hope the title is meant to be read as a sign of hope, people pay that money because they probably want to see the game be made. How can you expect a fully functional game of that size before putting in considerable amounts of money? Just think of the latest GTA with a 1/4 of a billion funding. Have some faith in creativity .
- If companies would properly take care of their employees in the first place they won't need to be unionized. There are many legal tactics companies can use to avoid union bullies.

Sarah Ward I feel sorry for you dear, you are lost in stress hormones, and missing the point entirely, esp with a hormone like cortisol, which is elevated in ATHLETES and those who are more ACTIVE, such as a NATURAL animal in its NATURAL environment, the open sea...swimming THOUSANDS of more miles per month, than an ENSLAVED being, being kept in a TINY tank, with barely enough room to swim enough to release an endorphine, let alone a hormone that is NORMALLY elevated by a NATURAL LIFE, in a NATURAL ENVIRONMENT....ya know genius, my stress hormones would go down if I was kept in a tiny tank and had nothing to worry about and nowhere to go, however, I would not call what I was doing LIVING....again, you are attempting to defend the indefensible, warping the use of biochemistry to fit your PORPOISES....when you are ready to have lower cortisol levels via the extreme adrenal exhaustion put upon you from being held a captive prisoner and tortured every day, let me know....I know some guys in the plexiglass business

Travis, that shows about how much research you have done. Please, explain the dozens of old newspaper records reporting 7, 8, 10, and 12 foot skeletons being found by mimers, farmers turning up their land, railroad workers clearing land, and construction crews digging new foundations? Or the MANY skulls that can be found in south America that range from 2-4x the size of the average human skull? Don't be fooled by the things the scientific community hides and shove under the rug in an attempt to protect their own theories and truths.
